Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
lasagna \lasagna\, lasagne \lasagne\(l[.a]*z[.a]n"y[u^]), n. 1. A baked dish of layers of lasagna[2] pasta with sauce and cheese and meat or vegetables; -- a popular dish of Italian cuisine. [WordNet 1.5]
2. large flat rectangular strips of pasta. [WordNet 1.5]
lasagna n 1: baked dish of layers of lasagna pasta with sauce and cheese and meat or vegetables [syn: {lasagne}] 2: very wide flat strips of pasta [syn: {lasagne}]
